scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n "Server,Client" -c "yellow.bold,cyan.bold" "cd flhub-api && npm run start:dev" "cd flhub-client && npm run start"
scripts.postinstall: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail -n "Server,Client" -c "yellow.bold,cyan.bold" "cd flhub-api && npm i && npm run build" "cd flhub-client && npm i && npm run build"
scripts.start: cd flhub-api/dist && node -r dotenv/config -r tsconfig-paths/register main.js
